title: Silver80
author: Silver80
content: so far we are still confused by the terms that exist in cryptocurrencies.Â  let's collect into one.

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: A quick Google search will do it, or even just look around Bitcointalk. Dozens and dozens of people have already created those "crypto glossary" threads that it would be very unproductive and very unnecessary to create more.

comments.author: worle1bm
comments.body: Quote from: mk4 on May 10, 2022, 04:32:58 AMA quick Google search will do it, or even just look around Bitcointalk. Dozens and dozens of people have already created those "crypto glossary" threads that it would be very unproductive and very unnecessary to create more.Yes there are already many topics on the crypto vocab and you could simply also google the words or say like crypto dictionary @OP is looking for.Like we already have such topics on the forum:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=126798.0https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2353534.0So you can search for words you are looking for and have your glossary.

comments.author: franky1
comments.body: over the years many have said of many confusing termsEG'wallet'definition. - a place to store your keys. see:keyring or pocketEGwallet/app/node, many cant tell them apart anymoreEGfullnode - many people think turning off certain network requirements(full archiving for seeding blocks to leacher nodes) is still deemed as full(facepalm)
